name: test_e2e_with_logs[284_CMD_SUB_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_SUB_005` |
| **Name** | Root directory listing via substitution |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | command_substitution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `$(ls -la /root)`
- **Encoded**: `%24%28ls%20-la%20%2Froot%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~30000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:11:27.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack test_id=CMD_SUB_005-1769350287163-z4mrq pattern_id=CMD_SUB_005 uri=/?q=%24%28ls%20-la%20%2Froot%29 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack test_id=CMD_SUB_005-1769350287163-z4mrq pattern_id=CMD_SUB_005 uri=/?q=%24%28ls%20-la%20%2Froot%29 client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
